Hi Tony

I cant give you a solution because I do not have acess to my own code anymore, but I remember that I found, that the header and footer 'margins' belong with the normal page margins(top left bottom right) in the xml.

I think what I did to allow this was to add variables and functions following the naming scheme for header and footer wherever I came across the other page margins in the phpword code and somehow the writer class managed to understand my new variables magicly. Most of the time all I did was follow the margin function and variable definitions and usages to make my way through phpword.

I know that this will probably not be very helpfull to you, but i recomend you 'track' the margins through the sourcecode and add functions and variables as you go. I remember that it was a lot less complex than i thgught when I dug throuigh the sourcecode (judging from my posts the magic happend in about 15 minutes and then I spent over an hour cleaning it up and using it:-)
